description: Try our easy to follow Vegetable Shepherd's Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Vegetable Shepherd's Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add onion, carrot, celery and garlic, and cook for 7-8 minutes, stirring, or until vegetables soften. Add mushroom, rosemary and thyme, and cook for 1 minute, stirring, or until fragrant.
Stir in paste, stock, beans, lentils and tomatoes. Bring to the boil, then reduce heat to medium and simmer for 20 minutes, uncovered, or until thickened. Season, remove from heat and stir in peas.

Meanwhile, bring a large pan of water to the boil. Cook both potatoes for 12-15 minutes or until tender. Drain and return to pan. Mash, then add butter and milk. Mash again until quite smooth, then season.
Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Spoon vegetable mixture into an 8-cup capacity ovenproof dish. Top with mash and sprinkle over parmesan. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden. Serve.
